docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version. Users are recommended to use API v2 as future versions of Foreman will change the default to v2 and then deprecate and/or remove v1. You may explicitly use v1 by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/subnets/980190962
200
{
  "subnet": {
    "id": 980190962,
    "name": "one",
    "network": "2.3.4.0",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0",
    "priority": null,
    "vlanid": "41",
    "gateway": null,
    "dns_primary": null,
    "dns_secondary": null,
    "from": null,
    "to": null,
    "domain_ids": [
      22495316
    ],
    "dns_id": 113629430,
    "dhcp_id": 980190962,
    "tftp_id": 298486374,
    "cidr": 24,
    "ipam": true,
    "dhcp": {
      "id": 980190962,
      "name": "DHCP Proxy",
      "url": "https://somewhere.net:8443"
    },
    "tftp": {
      "id": 298486374,
      "name": "TFTP Proxy",
      "url": "http://somewhere.else"
    },
    "dns": {
      "id": 113629430,
      "name": "DNS Proxy",
      "url": "http://else.where:45671"
    }
  }
}

methods.name: create

params.name: ipam
params.description: Enable IP Address auto suggestion for this subnet

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.description: Domains in which this subnet is part

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

examples:
POST /api/subnets
{
  "subnet": {
    "name": "QA2",
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0"
  }
}
200
{
  "subnet": {
    "id": 1018350796,
    "name": "QA2",
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0",

    "gateway": null,

    "dns_secondary": null,
    "from": null,

    "tftp_id": null,
    "cidr": 24,
    "ipam": true,
    "dhcp": null,
    "tftp": null,
    "dns": null
  }
}
